1257350.name: Trouble Witches Origin,additional character : Yoko
1257350.description:
A new high school girl witch, Yoko Redｓtar is now available!
Yoko, who grew up in the magical city of Ahemland, is a cheerful schoolgirl dreaming of becoming a fine witch someday. She is always surrounded by many friends and grew up without any inconvenience, but she is a little tired of the mediocre and bottomless days. One day, she quarrel with her parents who they do not allow her to become a witch, she quarreled with her parents who they do not allow her to become a witch. That's why, she shined her eyes when she saw a flyer of Amalgam subjugation that has come down from the castle. Then she jumped out from her home without hearing the advice of her friend Michael (super conservatives).

* If you purchase this download content, you can play a new character "yoko" with "Trouble ☆ Witches Origin!"
